remarks: Complex multiplication in terms of real and imaginary parts.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 23-Feb-2020.)
statement: mulreim $p |- ( ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR ) /\ ( C e. RR /\ D e. RR ) ) -> ( ( A + ( _i x. B ) ) x. ( C + ( _i x. D ) ) ) = ( ( ( A x. C ) + -u ( B x. D ) ) + ( _i x. ( ( C x. B ) + ( D x. A ) ) ) ) ) $.
